reviews.review: Great puzzle game, loved the story and playing coop with a friend. Definetly recommend trying it out!
I have played for 80 hours in this game beating it 10 times now
why SHOULD'NT YOU PLAY THIS. it's funny, not that difficult and sharpen's your brain

Portal 2 doesn't have an 98% positive review score out of 163,000 reviews for nothing. The game brought an already unique and revolutionary game even more content and depth in this sequel. I will admit if you are going to get Portal 2, you should 100% check out the free workshop creation for it called Portal Stories: MEL, it brings a breath of fresh air into an already awesome and amazing game.
This game is full of nostalgia and has a great story.
fun game would recommend to any fans of puzzle games
Best game ever. I keep coming back to this game all the time

like the first, but better, much better. 
Tons of fun, the puzzles can make you scratch your head for a minute occasionally, but never so hard that it takes more than a few minutes. mostly it's just trying to determine what they want you to do, and occasionally you have to wander the level to find the missing pieces to figure that out.
Overall very fluid gameplay, and I plan to replay it plenty in the future
muy bueno y mas con amigos
10/10 game a truly great story and im sad it ended so soon
reminds me of sex with big bitches :p
Great game, love the creativity. I started playing it for a class project and decided to download it for my own pleasure. 10/10.
Really cool puzzle game. Amazing story line and co-op game mode. Great graphics, and fun game play overall.

Amazing game , I played co-op Super fun Not a demanding 
title  at all

A masterpiece of a game.  Amazing soundtrack that you barely notice but is a nice touch.  A story which doesn't require you play the first game cause they never shut up about what it all wrapped up to in the last game, killing Glados.  Got 10 bucks to spare?  This is a must buy.  This is a puzzle game done right.
To say the least good multiplayer co-op and good single player offerings as well.

Portal 2 is really satisfying, the concept of placing 2 portals is so simple but so varied I've had many AHA moments playing portal 2. My one complaint is a level in chapter 7 I think. You have to use all three types of paint. Basically you have to gain momentum and launch yourself at two blobs of bouncy goo and jump over this gap. My solution to gaining momentum was to create a portal between two walls and flick to the slanted platform to launch myself at the goo blobs. This wasn't the intended way to do the puzzle so I spent the better half of 30 minutes getting wound up over it trying get it right. Just a small flaw in the level design but I got really wound up over it.
i really enjoyed the first one. and i really really enjoyed this one too!
